our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.paragraph1: Founded in 2018, Timeless Store began with a simple vision: to create a fashion marketplace that focuses on quality, sustainability, and timeless design. What started as a small boutique in Colombo has grown into Sri Lanka's leading online fashion destination.
our_story.paragraph2: Our journey is rooted in the belief that fashion should be accessible, ethical, and long-lasting. We partner with both established and emerging designers who share our values, bringing you carefully curated collections that stand the test of time.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.paragraph1: At Timeless Store, our mission is to redefine fashion retail in Sri Lanka by offering high-quality, sustainable products that inspire confidence and self-expression. We aim to build lasting relationships with our customers through exceptional service and a personalized shopping experience.
our_mission.paragraph2: We're committed to ethical practices throughout our supply chain, working only with partners who provide fair wages and safe working conditions. By 2025, we aim to have 80% of our products made from sustainable materials and reduce our carbon footprint by 50%.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We source the best materials and work with skilled artisans to ensure every product meets our high standards.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We're committed to reducing our environmental impact through eco-friendly materials and practices.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously explore new technologies and approaches to improve our products and customer experience.

community.title: Community
community.description: We invest in local communities through employment opportunities and social initiatives.

our_team.title: Our Team
our_team.jane_bio: With over 15 years of experience in fashion retail, Jane leads our company with passion and vision. She ensures every decision aligns with our core values.
our_team.john_bio: John oversees our technology infrastructure and digital experience. His innovative approach has revolutionized how our customers shop online.
our_team.sarah_bio: Sarah brings her artistic vision and industry expertise to curate our collections. She works closely with designers to create exclusive pieces for Timeless Store.

2018.title: Our Beginning
2018.description: Opened our first boutique store in Colombo with a small collection of local designers.

2020.title: Online Launch
2020.description: Launched our e-commerce platform during the pandemic, reaching customers across Sri Lanka.

2022.title: Expansion
2022.description: Expanded our product range to include home decor and lifestyle products. Opened our second physical store.

2024.title: International Shipping
2024.description: Started shipping internationally and introduced our first fully sustainable collection.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Standard shipping within Sri Lanka takes 2-4 business days. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unworn items in original condition with tags attached. Please see our Returns & Exchanges page for full details.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and bank transfers. We also offer cash on delivery for orders within Colombo.

size.question: How do I find my size?
size.answer: Each product page includes detailed size information. You can also refer to our Size Guide for general measurements across different brands.

chatbot.welcome: Welcome to Envogue! I can help you find the perfect product, answer questions about our store, and guide you through your shopping experience. Click on a quick question below or type your own!

greetings.response: Hello! Welcome to Envogue. How can I assist you today?

thanks.response: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

farewell.response: Thank you for chatting with Envogue. Have a great day!

howAreYou.response: I'm doing great, thank you for asking! I'm here to help you with any shopping needs.

productAvailability.response: We have {{totalProducts}} products across {{categories}} categories. Currently, {{inStockProducts}} products are in stock. Would you like to hear about our top categories?

recommendation.available: I recommend our {{productName}} from the {{category}} category. It's priced at Rs {{price}} and available in {{colors}} colors.
recommendation.outOfStock: I'd love to recommend a product, but we're currently low on stock.

payment.response: We offer flexible payment options! Each product has an installment plan. For example, you can pay in 3 installments. The installment price is clearly shown for each product.

order.response: To place an order, simply browse our products, select your desired item, choose a color, and click 'Add to Cart'. Then proceed to checkout and complete your purchase.

shipping.response: We provide tracking for all orders. After purchase, you'll receive a tracking number via email. Typical shipping takes 3-5 business days.

returns.response: We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item in its original condition for a full refund.

support.response: You can reach our customer support via email at support@envogue.com or call our helpline at +1 (555) 123-4567. We're available Monday to Saturday, 9 AM to 6 PM.

discount.response: We occasionally offer seasonal discounts. Sign up for our newsletter to get the latest deals and promotional offers!
